title: Any good articles/tutorials on typography?
content:
So yeah I am pretty new to design and I was wondering if anyone knew of some good tips/rules/articles/tutorials on typography and what makes it look good etc. Because I seem to be having problems in my web design with the text looking like it belongs/being easy on the eyes/looking fantastic. So I was just wondering if anyone would like to help out :D

Cheers,  
 Nub
author: Nub
